mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure that all images scale appropriately and interactive elements are well-spaced for easier tapping on smaller devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and implement lazy loading to reduce initial page load time.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve content with more targeted keywords and optimize meta tags for better search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Consider adding a search bar for quick navigation to specific sections of the site.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps and adding clear progress indicators.
tips: Improve page speed with image optimization
